articles.title: About the author
articles.description:
This blog consists of my attempts to critically evaluate while re-creating visualization charts using R and Tableau for data science applications. Have fun reading and feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn!

**Name**: Lim Jiahui

**Email**: jiahui.lim.2020@mitb.smu.edu.sg

**LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jiahui-lim-450/
